orderCreated.name: Order Created
orderCreated.description: The rental order has been placed and confirmed.

photosSent.name: Photos Sent
photosSent.description: The owner sends photos of the product before shipping.

moneySent.name: Money Sent
moneySent.description: Payment has been sent by the renter.

moneyReceived.name: Money Received
moneyReceived.description: Payment has been received by the owner.

packageSent.name: Package Sent
packageSent.description: The rental item has been shipped.

packageReceived.name: Package Received
packageReceived.description: The rental item has been received by the renter.

packageSentBack.name: Package Sent Back
packageSentBack.description: The rental item has been returned by the renter.

packageReceivedBack.name: Package Received Back
packageReceivedBack.description: The rental item has been received back by the owner.
